name: Diamond Rush
description:
Diamond Rush is the simplest 3D game in which you have to overcome various traps and look for diamonds.
The essence of this game is very simple. Your main task is to explore a variety of locations and find the diamonds you need. But don't think that everything will be very easy. On your way there will be a huge variety of traps that you will have to overcome. Think over your every step and every action and this game will definitely not make you bored!

KEY FEATURES OF THE GAME:
- 15 levels.
- Interesting and simple gameplay.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Unforgettable atmosphere.
